TextView.android:text:
1.Accessing Contacts of your android phone through SMS.You just have to send a text with format 
password.contact.name 

2.Accessing GPS location of your mobile phone via SMS.You just have to send text with format password.loaction 

3.Changing your phone volume/mode to max volume/ringer.You just have to send text with format password.mode 

4.You can lock your phone using this app.You have to send a text with format password.lock
**note-You have to go to setting->device manager->this_app->Activate in order to use this features as it comes under android developer policy. 

5.You can make your phone ring with a text password.ring 

6.You can lock your phone with a pin with a text password.changepin.XXXX where XXXX is your 4 digit pin 

7.You can factory reset your phone with a text password.wipedata 

8.You can get battery status of your phone using text password.battery
